Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class BoardGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.BoardGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class BoardGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Class used to manages GUI board game implementation. It is divided into two parts, at the left side there is board created with a JPanel and a JLayeredPane 5 x 5 array, at the right side there is move buttons and all information about players card in game. Levels and workers are JLabel layer on the board array while workers of this player are JButton

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BoardGUI.PopUpBox
    PopUpBox class to show all the messages to the client, popUp has also a timer

    • verifyPlayerMove

      public void verifyPlayerMove()
      Method that checks that all the PlayerMove parameters are set. It sends a PlayerMove or PlayerMoveEnd to Server only if player has clicked worker, move or build button and cell It is called any time player click one of the move Listeners
